::Perndabot::

Perndabot hits the wall, making a dent as he falls backwards. He 
stands up, rubbing his head as he looks at the unconscious Rex. He 
must have knocked him out in the fight. But where was BrightBlade? 
She must be somewhere around here.

He nearly jumps as he sees someting move near him, realzing it was 
BrightBlade.

"There you are," he says to her, walking over to Rex and aiming his 
gun at the bot's head, "How'd you get caught?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@h...> wrote:
> * BrightBlade keeps her gun trained towards the door but then 
suddenly it 
> buckles and comes crashing down, a familier and rather large sight 
pummls 
> into the room.
> She slamms her back against the far wall as Perndabot trips towards 
her, a 
> rather surprised squeek coming from her.
> There wasn't  single place to run, though, she wasn't about to be 
squished 
> by a giant bot such as him.
> BrightBlade shimmied out of the way and simply watched Perndabot 
head for 
> the wall, looking at him with an expression that clearly said, " 
And I put 
> up with this?"
> 
>
